name: Black Flame's Protection
caption:
A black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles.

The Apostles were all embraced by the Gloam-Eyed Queen, and the black flame was their armor within.
info:
Draw black flame within to harden the body while blunting restorative power.

Increase <font color="#F395C4">physical damage negation</font> by 35% for 70 seconds but reduces all healing by 20%; counts as a body buff that cannot stack with similar effects.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Godskin, Godslayer

name: Bestial Sling
caption:
Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.

It is said that in the time before the Erdtree, stones were the first weapons of the beasts who had gained intelligence.
info:
Unleash a rapid spray of stone shards in a forward cone, firing immediately after other actions to flinch low-<font color="#E0B985">poise</font> foes.

<font color="#F395C4">Standard damage</font>: 0.87 x Incant scaling
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Bestial

name: Furious Blade of Ansbach
caption:
Incantation of Ansbach, Pureblood Knight.

Markedly different from the finessed swordplay of the dynast, this is an aggressive last resort of an incantation that gave rise to Ansbach's fearsome reputation.
info:
Summon a bloodflame blade from the hand and lunge through foes with successive slashes, each applying a stacking Bloodflame bleed; charging increases potency and attempts a fourth slash that hit rarely lands.

<font color="#C84343">Blood Loss:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100.

<font color="#F48C25">Fire damage per slash:</font> Incant Scaling x 0.97
<font color="#F48C25">Fire damage (final flame hit):</font> Incant Scaling x 1.54
<font color="#F48C25">Fire damage per slash (charged):</font> Incant Scaling x 0.98
<font color="#F48C25">Fire damage (final flame hit, charged):</font> Incant Scaling x 1.63
<font color="#C84343">Blood loss accumulation per hit:</font> 60 (20 ticks over 2 seconds; 180 total)
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage:</font> 4 + 4 + 2
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Blood Oath

name: Heal from Afar
caption:
An Erdtree incantation discovered in the realm of shadow.

Even when far beyond, far out of sight, the Erdtree will surely give us its blessing.
info:
Fire a glowing projectile that heals allies on contact or can be aimed at the ground for instant effect, while also damaging Wraiths and Revenants for (0.5% <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font>) + 300 and breaking their stance without drawing aggression; the spell cannot be cast while riding or in protected areas such as Roundtable Hold.

<font color="#E0B985">Self heal:</font> 4.2 x Incant scaling HP
<font color="#E0B985">Ally heal:</font> 3.36 x Incant scaling HP within 6 meters
<font color="#E0B985">Damage vs Wraiths/Revenants:</font> 0.5% <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> + 300
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Ancient Erdtree

name: Aspects of the Crucible: Thorns
caption:
Aspect of the Crucible that manifested in golden hippopotami.

In an age long past, before this land was enshrouded in shadow, the vitality of the Crucible flourished. Remains of this can be seen in the ancient ruins.
info:
Create a bristling mass of thorn-like fur on the caster's back before rolling across the ground to scour the area for pierce damage; charging increases potency and duration.

<font color="#F395C4">Physical damage per hit (uncharged):</font> 0.45 x Incant scaling
<font color="#F395C4">Physical damage per hit (charged):</font> 1.2 x Incant scaling
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage per hit:</font> 0.6 (five hits when charged)
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Ancient Erdtree

name: Aspects of the Crucible: Bloom
caption:
Aspect of the Crucible discovered in the ancient ruins.

In an age long past, before this land was enshrouded in shadow, the vitality of the Crucible flourished.
info:
Plant a miranda flower on your chest before calling down a rain of golden pillars after 2.2 seconds (2.55 charged).

<font color="#F5EB89">Holy damage per hit (uncharged):</font> 0.80 x Incant scaling
<font color="#F5EB89">Holy damage per hit (uncharged):</font> 1.00 x Incant scaling
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage per hit:</font> 2
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Ancient Erdtree

name: Minor Erdtree
caption:
Secret incantation of Queen Marika.
Only the kindness of gold, without Order.

Marika bathed the village of her home in gold, knowing full well that there was no one to heal.
info:
Summon an illusory Minor Erdtree that continuously heals allies in a radius that expands up to 3 meters over 2 seconds, draws enemy attention, and stacks with Crimsonburst Crystal Tear, Warming Stones, Sunwarmth Stones, and other healing incantations while intentionally not healing enemies beside the caster; the tree also damages Wraiths and Revenants every second without triggering stance break.

<font color="#E0B985">Healing per tick:</font> 9 HP every 0.25 seconds for 30 seconds (1080 total)
<font color="#E0B985">Damage vs Wraiths/Revenants per second:</font> (3% <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font>) + 10
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Ancient Erdtree

name: Land of Shadow
caption:
Incantation originating from Scadutree avatars.

This incantation channels the force of the Scadutree's power, and its gold is accompanied by shadow.
info:
Call down a hail of golden projectiles after a brief delay, letting the Scadutree's shadowed power rain down across foes; the initial pillar slams the area before spawning smaller follow-up bursts that stagger enemies within the same zone.

<font color="#F5EB89">Holy damage (main pillar):</font> 1.50 x Incant scaling
<font color="#F5EB89">Holy damage (lesser pillars):</font> 0.65 x Incant scaling
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Ancient Erdtree

name: Wrath from Afar
caption:
An Erdtree incantation discovered in the realm of shadow.

When the Elden Ring was shattered, the people of the realm of shadow felt it too-and feared it as a sign of the Erdtree's wrath.
info:
Release a golden shockwave that knocks foes down while dealing <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font>; charging increases its reach from 2 meters to 3 but does not benefit from charged spell buffs. Can be cast while riding (Torrent walks slowly).

<font color="#F5EB89">Holy damage (uncharged):</font> 1.00 x Incant scaling
<font color="#F5EB89">Holy damage (charged):</font> 1.20 x Incant scaling
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (uncharged):</font> 10
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (charged):</font> 15
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Ancient Erdtree

name: Light of Miquella
caption:
The strength of Miquella upon his deific return, wielded as an incantation.

Miquella sought to accept all that was and would be, but found one that refused to be embraced.

No wonder, as one god, and one king consort, is all the world needs.
info:
Annihilate foes with a pillar of light that erupts roughly 2.5 seconds after casting, the main burst knocking down targets in a 6 meter radius while the lesser pillars that follow stagger enemies in 1 meter pockets even if the aura is interrupted; the spell cannot be charged or cast on horseback, but the Circlet of Light boosts its damage by 10%.

<font color="#F5EB89">Holy damage (main pillar):</font> 3.75 x Incant scaling
<font color="#F5EB89">Holy damage (lesser pillars):</font> 0.70 x Incant scaling
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage:</font> 20 (main pillar) / 2 (lesser pillars)
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Miquellan

name: Multilayered Ring of Light
caption:
Incantation of those who served Miquella.

This light-ring incantation was cultivated by a tradition separate from Golden Order fundamentalism.
info:
Fire a multilayered ring of golden light that glides forward, dealing pure <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font>; charging increases potency, each cast replaces any existing ring across all players, and it can be cast while riding (Torrent walks swiftly) while Dryleaf Seal boosts the damage by 15% and Godfrey Icon boosts charged casts by 15%.

<font color="#F5EB89">Holy damage per hit (uncharged):</font> 2.00 x Incant scaling
<font color="#F5EB89">Holy damage per hit (charged):</font> 2.50 x Incant scaling charged
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (initial hit):</font> 8 (10 charged)
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (follow-up hits):</font> 1.5
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Miquellan

name: Roar of Rugalea
caption:
An incantation of what is jokingly called "the bear communion."
Channels the power of Rugalea, the great red bear.

An incantation that is more akin to the divine invocation of the hornsent than it is to the Dragon Communion. Only through desperate battle with the feral wild can one discover a god unique to oneself.
info:
Transform into a great red bear and emit a furious roar; the uncharged version delivers a single impact while the charged roar unleashes twelve lighter thrusts plus a final heavy strike. Headshots can stagger. Can be cast on horseback. Highland Axe offers no benefit.

<font color="#F395C4">Physical damage (uncharged roar):</font> 1.10 x Incant scaling
<font color="#F395C4">Physical damage (charged roar):</font> 12 hits at 0.45 x Incant scaling plus 1 hit at 1.62 x Incant scaling
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage:</font> 14 uncharged / 42 charged
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Spiral Tower

name: Knight's Lightning Spear
caption:
One of the incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult.

An incantation that was taught only to the most accomplished knights, and now a lost art in the Lands Between.
info:
Hurl a lightning spear while sigils erupt to fire two more shortly after, with follow-up bolts tracing the aim set by the first spear even if the cast is interrupted; the initial spear gains +40% <font color="#E0B985">attack power</font> while the trailing bolts deal -20%, water shockwaves can trigger twice for extra <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font> and 2 <font color="#C0B194">stance</font>. Can be cast while riding.

<font color="#FFE033">Lightning damage per projectile (uncharged):</font> 1.38 x Incant scaling
<font color="#FFE033">Lightning damage per projectile (charged):</font> 1.64 x Incant scaling
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage per projectile (uncharged):</font> 5
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage per projectile (charged):</font> 9.25
<font color="#FFE033">Lightning damage (water AoE):</font> 0.50 x Incant scaling
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (water AoE):</font> 2 (can trigger twice)
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Cult

name: Dragonbolt of Florissax
caption:
Special incantation of the ancient dragon Florissax.

There was a time when the priestess never knew love, and thus never used this incantation herself.
info:
Call down red lightning to surround the caster and nearby allies with a 7 meter aura for 70 seconds, increasing all damage negation by 10% (5% in PvP) while stacking diminishingly with non-aura negation effects such as Boiled Crab and boosting guard damage negation by 20% after the base shield reduction; this is an aura buff that cannot be charged or stacked with other aura-type buffs.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Cult

name: Electrocharge
caption:
One of the incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult.

The origin of incantations that bolster the body with lightning, and now a lost art in the Lands Between.
info:
Call down lightning to charge the caster's body, the strike dealing <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font> in a roughly 3 meter radius before applying a Body Buff that pulses <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font> every 0.2 seconds in a 2.5 meter radius for 45 seconds, bypassing guarding. Can be cast while riding. Does not trigger multi-hit buffs. Counts as a body buff.

<font color="#FFE033">Lightning damage (initial strike, uncharged):</font> 2.13 x Incant scaling
<font color="#FFE033">Lightning damage (initial strike, charged):</font> 2.62 x Incant scaling
<font color="#FFE033">Lightning damage (pulse, uncharged):</font> 0.45 x Incant scaling
<font color="#FFE033">Lightning damage (pulse, charged):</font> 0.59 x Incant scaling
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (initial strike, uncharged):</font> 7
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (initial strike, charged):</font> 10
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Cult

name: Bayle's Tyranny
caption:
One of the greatest Dragon Communion incantations.
Harnesses the fearsome power of Bayle the Dread.

Even after being consumed, the throbbing heart of Bayle continues to resist its subjugation, never weakening. One day, the fire within will consume the very body and soul of its Communion devourer. One day.
info:
Channel the dread dragon to roar with a heatwave burst of mostly <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font> and some <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font>; the start-up bolt causes light stagger before the explosion knocks foes down.

<font color="#F48C25">Fire damage (start-up bolt):</font> 0.50 x Incant scaling
<font color="#FFE033">Lightning damage (start-up bolt):</font> 0.20 x Incant scaling
<font color="#F48C25">Fire damage (explosion):</font> 3.25 x Incant scaling
<font color="#FFE033">Lightning damage (explosion):</font> 2.10 x Incant scaling
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (start-up bolt):</font> 2
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (explosion):</font> 25
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion

name: Bayle's Flame Lightning
caption:
One of the greatest Dragon Communion incantations.
Harnesses the fearsome power of Bayle the Dread.

Even after being consumed, the throbbing heart of Bayle continues to resist its subjugation, never weakening. One day, the fire within will consume the very body and soul of its Communion devourer. One day.
info:
Channel the dread dragon to strike with a flame-lightning talon bone; direct hits knock foes down, partial hits halve the damage and stance, lingering flames are left that trigger multi-hit effect.

<font color="#F395C4">Physical damage (direct hit):</font> 2.80 x Incant scaling
<font color="#F48C25">Fire damage (direct hit):</font> 2.20 x Incant scaling
<font color="#FFE033">Lightning damage (direct hit):</font> 2.80 x Incant scaling
<font color="#F48C25">Fire damage (lingering flames):</font> 1.50 x Incant scaling
<font color="#FFE033">Lightning damage (lingering flames):</font> 2.00 x Incant scaling
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (direct hit):</font> 30
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (partial hit):</font> 15
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (lingering flames):</font> 2
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion

name: Ghostflame Breath
caption:
One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.

The land of spiritgraves is home to all manner of dead, and even the corpses of fallen dragons found their way there. Several of them were endowed with such vivacity that even in death, they could not fully die.
info:
Spew ghostflame breath from above after a two second wind-up, dealing <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font> while inflicting <font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite</font> accumulation; the breath can be extended to breathe again, swivelled mid-cast, and used while jumping but not on horseback in a roughly five second sequence.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

<font color="#57DBCE">Magic damage per hit:</font> 1.68 x Incant scaling
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage per hit:</font> 4
<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite accumulation per hit:</font> 0.55 x Incant scaling
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion

name: Rotten Butterflies
caption:
Incantation used by Romina, Saint of the Bud.

The scarlet butterflies are as the Goddess of Rot's wings. Bereft of a master, they were soothed by Romina, who reached out to them.
info:
Summon countless butterflies that break apart on contact, overlapping explosions that detonate quickly and spread <font color="#EF7676">Scarlet Rot</font>, building rot on anyone standing in the cloud while briefly granting immunity to grab attacks.

<font color="#EF7676">Scarlet Rot:</font> Inflicts 0.33% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> + 13 per second for 90 seconds (29.7% + 1170 total).

<font color="#F395C4">Physical damage (start-up):</font> 1.00 x Incant scaling
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (start-up):</font> 5
<font color="#F395C4">Physical damage (per explosion):</font> 1.00 x Incant scaling
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (per explosion):</font> 3
<font color="#EF7676">Scarlet Rot accumulation (per explosion):</font> 0.80 x Incant scaling
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Servants of Rot

name: Pest-Thread Spears
caption:
Skill of the pests known as the Kindred of Rot, now wielded as an incantation.

The pests are abandoned servants, and it is for this reason that they found a mother in the Saint of the Bud.
info:
Secrete sticky threads and twist them into two flying spears that pierce forward; hits every piece of geometry they pass through to punish large foes, and draws no enemy attention. Does not trigger multi-hit effects.

<font color="#F395C4">Physical damage (uncharged):</font> 1.80 x Incant scaling
<font color="#F395C4">Physical damage (charged):</font> 2.30 x Incant scaling
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage per hit (uncharged):</font> 3
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage per hit (charged):</font> 4
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Servants of Rot

name: Midra's Flame of Frenzy
caption:
Incantation in praise of Midra, Lord of Frenzied Flame.

The Lord of Frenzied Flame shall take their torment, despair. Their affliction. Every sin, every curse. All melted away.
Yet Midra, like others before him, was too weak to become a Lord.
info:
Summon Midra's head to spew frenzied flame in roughly a 5 meter radius while the input is held at, causing <font color="#E0B985">Madness</font> to all at 2.5 ticks per second. Can be used while moving or on horseback, and holding the input continues the effect until <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> is depleted or the caster is overcome by <font color="#E0B985">Madness</font>.

<font color="#EEAA2B">Madness:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100 and reduces FP equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum FP</font> plus 30. Only on Tarnished.

<font color="#F48C25">Fire damage per hit (projectile):</font> 0.75 x Incant scaling
<font color="#EEAA2B">Madness accumulation (per projectile):</font> 30
<font color="#EEAA2B">Madness accumulation per tick (enemies):</font> 10
<font color="#EEAA2B">Madness accumulation per tick (self):</font> 7
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Frenzied Flame

name: Watchful Spirit
caption:
An entreaty received from the Empyrean grandam.

"Take vengeance upon Messmer and his lot.
They who betrayed us, aye, they who burned us...
Let them face in thy wrath their just deserts."
info:
Summon a guardian Skull Spirit above the caster; the cast takes about 2 seconds and then roughly another 4 seconds for the spirit to fire 4 projectiles every few seconds. Is not boosted by the Spiraltree Seal.

<font color="#F5EB89">Holy damage per hit:</font> 1.00 x Incant scaling
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage per hit:</font> 5
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Spiral Tower

name: Golden Arcs
caption:
Sorcery of the inquisitors of the tower, wielded as an incantation of the spiral.

The arcs resemble barbs, a known symbol of coercive questioning.
info:
Swing the arm to release a procession of three golden arcs that race forward; charging extends their reach and power, they can be fired in quick succession, the cast costs 12 <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> and 20 stamina (26 while charged), Spiraltree Seal boosts damage by 20%, Godfrey Icon raises charged damage by 15%, and it can be cast while riding (Torrent walks slowly).

<font color="#F5EB89">Holy damage (per arc):</font> 0.80 x Incant scaling uncharged / 0.95 x Incant scaling charged
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (per arc):</font> 5 (15 total)
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Spiral Tower

name: Giant Golden Arc
caption:
Sorcery of the inquisitors of the tower, wielded as an incantation of the spiral.

The arc resembles the barb, a known symbol of coercive questioning.
info:
Swing the arm to release a giant golden arc that tracks targets, pierces every enemy it touches, and keeps traveling through cramped corridors; charging increases its force, the cast costs 24 <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> and 20 stamina (26 while charged), it can be cast in quick succession, can be used while riding (Torrent walks slowly), and Spiraltree Seal boosts damage by 20% while Godfrey Icon raises charged damage by 15%.

<font color="#F5EB89">Holy damage:</font> 2.15 x Incant scaling uncharged / 2.65 x Incant scaling charged
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage:</font> 8 (12 charged)
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Spiral Tower

name: Spira
caption:
Superior sorcery of the tower priests, wielded as an incantation of the spiral.

The spiral is a normalized Crucible current that, one day, will form a column that stretches to the gods.
info:
Wrap both arms together to draw a spiral of light beneath the target, rooting the caster while each burst erupts at the enemy's feet and retargets between bursts; hold to keep conjuring until <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> or <font color="#E0B985">stamina</font> runs dry. The caster stays rooted while the spirals persist; can be cast while riding.

<font color="#F5EB89">Holy damage per hit:</font> 1.60 x Incant scaling
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage per hit:</font> 3
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Spiral Tower

name: Divine Beast Tornado
caption:
The tempest of the Dancing Lion, wielded as an incantation.

The majority of divine beasts were gored and hung upon Messmer's spears, then burned in his flame. Those who witnessed the deed likened it to a funeral pyre for the tower itself.
info:
Twist the body like a whirlwind to call a storm around the caster, staggering nearby foes with the opening gust before driving a tornado forward; charging increases the tornado's force and launches enemies upward. Can be cast on horseback. Not boosted by the Spiraltree Seal.

<font color="#F395C4">Physical damage (tornado):</font> 2.20 x Incant scaling
<font color="#F395C4">Physical damage (tornado, charged):</font> 2.75 x Incant scaling
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (start-up gust):</font> 3
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (tornado):</font> 8
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Spiral Tower

name: Divine Bird Feathers
caption:
A technique of the divine bird warriors, the very first of all horned warriors, wielded as an incantation.

The divine bird warriors, and indeed this technique, are said to bear resemblance to the golden Crucible.
info:
Spread both arms like wings to scatter razor feathers while moving; holding the input releases continuous volleys. Can be cast while moving and on horseback. Not boosted by the Spiraltree Seal.

<font color="#F395C4">Physical damage (per feather):</font> 0.42 x Incant scaling
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (per feather):</font> 1
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Spiral Tower

name: Fire Serpent
caption:
Incantation of the Fire Knights under Messmer the Impaler's personal command.

When the flame they received from Messmer would not find purchase within them, the Fire Knights relied on fire incantations to honor their bond.
info:
Launch a serpentine flame that lingers briefly before curling toward the nearest foe, bursting instantly at point-blank range and favoring short-range duels; without a lock-on it fires at the nearest onscreen enemy or, if none, toward the ground. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F48C25">Fire damage (uncharged):</font> 1.68 x Incant scaling
<font color="#F48C25">Fire damage (charged):</font> 2.10 x Incant scaling
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (uncharged):</font> 6
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (charged):</font> 8
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Messmer's Flame

name: Rain of Fire
caption:
Incantation of Salza, sage of the Fire Knights.

Salza's disdain for barbarism never waned, even as he burned more villages and scorched more land than any other.
info:
Summon a cloud of flame overhead that pelts foes for roughly four seconds, landing 10-20 hits across a medium-long area; charging amplifies the storm, it shares its stance with Fire's Deadly Sin, it manifests directly above the caster if no lock-on exists. Cannot be cast while riding.

<font color="#F48C25">Fire damage per hit (uncharged):</font> 0.52 x Incant scaling
<font color="#F48C25">Fire damage per hit (charged):</font> 0.63 x Incant scaling
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage per hit:</font> 1.5
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Messmer's Flame

name: Messmer's Orb
caption:
An incantation of Messmer the Impaler.

Messmer despised his own fire. Time and time again he hoped to rid himself of it, but ever did it burn.
info:
Shape Messmer's flame into a floating orb that hurtles forward, dealing a contact hit before burrowing for a delayed explosion that knocks foes down; the cast lacks hyper armor, charging extends its travel distance and power, the explosion spans about 4 meters uncharged or 6 meters charged.

<font color="#F48C25">Fire damage (contact, uncharged):</font> 0.50 x Incant scaling
<font color="#F48C25">Fire damage (explosion, uncharged):</font> 3.08 x Incant scaling
<font color="#F48C25">Fire damage (contact, charged):</font> 0.70 x Incant scaling
<font color="#F48C25">Fire damage (explosion, charged):</font> 4.11 x Incant scaling
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (contact, uncharged):</font> 4+4
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (explosion, uncharged):</font> 25
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (contact, charged):</font> 4+4
<font color="#C0B194">Stance damage (explosion, charged):</font> 35
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Messmer's Flame
